description: Embed and manage publicly accessible Tableau visualizations into Bubble. Supports v3 of the Tableau Embedding API.
name: Tableau Embedded
plugin_instructions:
Drag the Tableau Viz element on to your page and specify a publicly accessible Tableau visualization URL using the render action. Provides actions:
 
"Render" the Tableau visualization from the URL.

"Refresh" the Tableau visualization.

"Pause" the render updates.

"Resume" the render updates.

"Undo" the last action.

"Redo" the last undo.

"Revert" all the actions.
